questionTexts.text: How well do we understand what your company actually needs from us?
questionTexts.help: Do you think Mayflower knows what your business needs? Does Mayflower understand your business goals? How well does our work reflect your ideas?
How well does Mayflower handle your input? How good do we communicate? How effective do we reflect and improve on problems?
This is what you commissioned us to do - our core tasks and services for you as defined in our contract.
questionTexts.placeholder: Vue.JS Frontend development, NixOS consulting, ReactJS Workshop, ...

questionTexts.text: What are the essentials we have to deliver?
questionTexts.help: What are the must-have results you need from us?
questionTexts.placeholder: Scrum Master, NixOS consulting, Agile Coaching, ...

questionTexts.text: What should we deliver more of?
questionTexts.help: Which of our skills and competencies do you value, but need more of?
questionTexts.placeholder: DevOps, Agile/Lean Requiremens Engineering, Microservices Architecture, ...

questionTexts.help: What excites you? How could our competencies assist you further?
questionTexts.placeholder: NixOS workshops, workshop for Software Architecture, Agile Coaching for Kanban and Scrum, ...

questionTexts.text: What should we avoid to do in the future?
questionTexts.help: What don't you need? Where do we err? What should we stop? (As in: 'Really, people. Stop it NOW.')
questionTexts.placeholder: 'Remote Sprint Retrospective Meeting', 'Calling our PO instead of mailing her', 'Daily Standup at 8 o'Clock',...'

questionTexts.text: What competencies and abilities should we acquire?
questionTexts.help: What do you need from us that we are missing so far? - Expect non-agile Software Engineering and code-monkeying. We don't do that.
We've calculated a suggestion for our next feedback meeting, based on the interval rule that you've set in your profile. Adjust as needed!
Which tasks should we work on until the next feedback date?

questionTexts.text: How likely is it that you would recommend our company/product to a friend or colleague?
questionTexts.help:
We use this to calculate our Net Promoter Score and determine how good we serve our customers. 
Hint: Getting a 9+ rating really excites us - it means you love what we do and we did our job right.
